attributes.review: This is a horrible app it Took five days to download and I couldn’t use my phone those five days cause I completely shut my phone down then when I got it back on all my messages were deleted and so are my contacts I just want to get more info and see how good of a President Trump is.But I couldn’t and while my phone was shut down I try to log into my iCloud on a different phone but they shut my iCloud down and deleted it so I had to wait until it was done downloading and It finally was done downloading and I opened the app.And my phone AutoCorrect’s everything now just to sum this up this is a horrible app it made my fish died because I opened it up standing next to my fish tank and I killed all my fish and then my dog when I open the app next to her she jumped on me and broke my phone and then I had to get a new phone so yeah this is a horrible app and just don’t download it

attributes.review: not only is it run by an ugly, orange, misogynistic, homophobic racist, it’s just not a cute app overall. This app is so trash it almost made me gag. This app needs to be taken off of the App Store. It’s disgusting and inappropriate. This man (along with his entire team) should honestly be in prison. He has several rape and misconduct allegations against him and he has expressed many times how anti-POC he is. He not only despises people of color, but he also has proven time and time again how xenophobic and homophobic he is. He has made countless efforts to eliminate the rights and livelihood of members of the LGBTQ+ community. He has also pushed a narrative of immigrants of color being “violent and thugs”. I noticed that he hasn’t treated immigrants from predominantly white countries this way. This further proves his blatant bigotry against all nonwhites. A man like him should NEVER be an influence or have a platform because it will simply allow him to continue to spread hate and prejudice. DELETE THIS APP APPLE.
attributes.title: this app is literally so horrible
